nodes.userMessage: Hey! It's Gary, Mike's dad. He told me you could help me with internet stuff. I downloaded the TikTok!

choices.text: Hi Gary! Great, so how do you like TikTok?
Ah, TikTok... You know that's mostly for young people, right?

nodes.userMessage: It's wonderful! There's videos of cats, DIY stuff, and young people dancing. But I don't understand why everyone keeps saying 'ratio' in the comments. Is that a compliment?

choices.text: Uh... not really. It's when people want to get more likes than your comment. It's kind of a put-down.
Yes it's a compliment! It means they think you're cool.

nodes.userMessage: Young people? But there's tons of people my age! I saw a guy who makes videos about tractors. He has 2 million followers!

choices.text: You're right, there's all kinds of content on TikTok! What kind of videos do you want to make?
2 million? That's probably fake, be careful of scams.

nodes.userMessage: Oh darn! And I've been replying 'thank you so much, ratio to you too!' for a week... Oh well. Can you help me make my first video?

choices.text: Haha, no worries! Yes of course, what do you want to make a video about?
Are you sure you want to get into this? It's a lot of work...

nodes.userMessage: Great! So I replied 'ratio' to everyone too. People are really nice on the internet! Anyway, can you help me go viral?

choices.text: Uh... actually Gary, I need to tell you the truth. 'Ratio' isn't really a compliment...
Yes! So to go viral, you need to post a lot and follow the trends.

nodes.userMessage: I was thinking of making videos of my tomatoes from the garden! And maybe some DIY tips. My wife says nobody will watch but I'm sure it can work.

choices.text: Gardening does really well on TikTok! There's a whole community. Go for it!
That's a good start, but you might need to spice it up a bit. Tomatoes alone aren't very exciting.

nodes.userMessage: Fake? But no, he shows his tractors! You can't fake a tractor. So are you helping me or not?

choices.text: You're right, sorry. Yes I'll help! What kind of videos do you want to make?
Ok ok, I'll help. But be careful not to share your personal info.

nodes.userMessage: I want to make gardening videos! And maybe my wife's recipes. She makes an amazing potato gratin. Do you think I can put music on it? I like Frank Sinatra.

choices.text: For music, it's better to use TikTok's trending sounds, otherwise your video won't be seen as much. Sinatra is tricky for copyright.
Put Sinatra! It's your account, do what you want.

nodes.userMessage: Work? But no, it's just little videos! My neighbor Bob does them and he says it's easy. He even made 50 bucks last month!

choices.text: Oh yeah, you can make money with the creator fund. But you need a lot of views. What kind of content do you want to make?
50 bucks for hours of work... That's not really profitable.

nodes.userMessage: Really? What is it then? Oh no, I said ratio to the mayor on his New Year's video... He's gonna think I'm mocking him!

choices.text: Haha! Delete the comment quick, he might not have seen it yet. Click on the three little dots next to it.
Eh, the mayor probably has better things to do than read TikTok comments. Don't worry.

nodes.userMessage: You think so? Great! But I have a problem. I filmed my first video but it's upside down. And I don't know how to flip it. Also my finger is in front of the camera for 30 seconds.

choices.text: No problem! In the TikTok editor you can trim the beginning and flip the video. I'll explain step by step.
The finger in front of the camera is a classic! It could even become your signature move.

nodes.userMessage: Spice it up? What do you mean? You want me to put spice on my tomatoes? Is that a thing with young people?

choices.text: Haha no! I meant make it more dynamic. Like transitions, jokes, that kind of thing.
No no, it's an expression. It means make it more interesting. But your tomatoes are great!

nodes.userMessage: Trending sounds? What's that? Is there a song called 'trending sound'? I don't know it. Who sings it?

choices.text: No it's not a specific song! It's the popular music of the moment on TikTok. They change every week.
When you create a video, click on 'Sounds' and you'll see the most popular ones. It's automatic.

nodes.userMessage: You're right! It's my account after all. So I put 'New York, New York' on my tomato video. The song is 4 minutes, is that too long?

choices.text: Uh... on TikTok videos are usually 15-60 seconds. 4 minutes is very long, people won't watch till the end.
If your content is good, people will watch! Post it and we'll see.

nodes.userMessage: It's not about the money! It's about sharing my passion. Plus Bob is jealous because my tomatoes are nicer than his.

choices.text: Haha! Neighbor rivalry, I love it. Show him who has the best tomatoes on TikTok!
That's great motivation! Alright, let's do this. Have you filmed anything yet?

nodes.userMessage: Done! Phew. Ok, now can you explain how to make a video? I have lots of ideas. I want to show my garden, my barbecue, and my bottle cap collection.

choices.text: The bottle cap collection could be original! Start with a simple video: film your garden while walking around, with some nice music.
Start with just one topic, otherwise it'll be a mess. The garden is good for starting out.

nodes.userMessage: Ok! So where do I tap? There's so many buttons... Wait, I pressed something and now I have bunny ears on my head. Is that normal?

choices.text: Haha yes that's a filter! You can remove it by pressing the same button. Or keep it if you like it.
Those are TikTok filters. There's tons of them! Try others, it's fun.

nodes.userMessage: My signature move! I like that idea. 'Gary the Finger' sounds good right? Or 'The Finger Gardener'?

choices.text: Uh... maybe just 'Gary's Garden' or 'Grandpa's Veggies'? It's clearer for the content.
'Gary the Finger' is... original! People will definitely remember it.

nodes.userMessage: Transitions? What's that? Like on TV when the image goes 'whoosh'?

choices.text: Exactly! On TikTok it's very popular. You can go from one shot to another with effects.
Yes that's it! But for now, keep it simple. Transitions are for later.

nodes.userMessage: Thanks! I have another question. What's a 'POV'? Lots of videos start with that. Is it a brand?

choices.text: POV means 'Point Of View'. It's when you make it seem like the viewer is living the scene.
It's a video format where you play a character. Like 'POV: you're a tomato in my garden'.

nodes.userMessage: They change every week?! But how am I supposed to keep up? I already struggle with the TV guide...

choices.text: Don't worry! When you scroll on TikTok, you'll hear the same sounds coming back often. Those are the ones to use.
Otherwise, make your videos without trending music. The content is what matters!

nodes.userMessage: Oh that's handy! So I clicked on 'Sounds' and there's something called 'Oh no, oh no, oh no no no'. Is that good?

choices.text: Haha yes that's a classic! But it's more for videos where something goes wrong. For your tomatoes, look for something more upbeat.
Yes! Put that on a video where your tomatoes have a problem, like slugs. It'll be funny.

nodes.userMessage: 15 seconds?! But how do I show all my tomatoes in 15 seconds? I have 47 plants!

choices.text: Show the best ones! Or make multiple videos. One per variety for example.
Make a quick montage! 1 second per tomato plant, that's 47 seconds. Perfect.

nodes.userMessage: I posted it! It's been 2 hours and I have 3 views. Is 3 views good? Is that a lot?

choices.text: For a first video that's normal! First videos rarely go viral. Keep posting regularly.
3 views is a start! And it's probably you, your wife, and Bob. Give the algorithm time.

nodes.userMessage: Yes! I'll show him! By the way he has a TikTok account too, he's called 'BobTheGardener'. Think I can comment on his videos to tease him a bit?

choices.text: Haha yes, a friendly jab can be funny! But stay nice, it's public.
Do a duet! It's a TikTok feature where you react to his video. It can be really funny.

nodes.userMessage: Ok! I filmed my garden. But my wife walks by in her bathrobe at one point. Do I cut it or leave it? She'll kill me if I post that.

choices.text: Cut cut cut! For your marital survival, we're removing that part.
Ask her first! Maybe she'll think it's funny. Or not.

nodes.userMessage: I'm keeping it! The bunny ears make me look younger. My wife says I look like an idiot but I think it's cute. Are there other funny filters?

choices.text: Tons! There's one that ages you, one that turns you into a baby, a woman, a cartoon... Have fun!
Yes but be careful, for gardening videos filters aren't really appropriate. Save those for fun videos.

nodes.userMessage: There's one that gives me a huge beard! And another that makes my voice robotic! This thing is amazing. My wife doesn't understand why I've been laughing alone for 20 minutes.

choices.text: Haha! Welcome to TikTok Gary. You're gonna have fun. Now, shall we make that gardening video?
Make a video with all the filters! Like you switch from one to another. It could go viral.

nodes.userMessage: 'Grandpa's Veggies'! I love it! It's cute and says what I do. I'll take it! How do I change my name on the app?

choices.text: Go to your profile, click 'Edit profile' and you can change your username.
Careful, you can only change your name once every 30 days. Make sure you're happy with it!

nodes.userMessage: You think so? Ok I'll keep it then. 'Gary the Finger, the gardener who points.' Sounds like an ad slogan right?

choices.text: It's... unique! Come on, let's make your first video. Show me those tomatoes!
Gary, honestly, maybe we should think of another name...

nodes.userMessage: I want to do the 'whoosh'! How do you do it? I tried moving the phone fast but it just looks blurry.

choices.text: Haha no! Transitions are done in editing. You film two separate shots and TikTok puts them together with an effect.
There are tutorials on TikTok to learn transitions. Search 'transition tutorial' in the search bar.

nodes.userMessage: Oh I see! So I could do 'POV: you're my pruning shears'? Is that the idea?

choices.text: Haha yes exactly! You film from the point of view of the shears cutting tomatoes. It can be very creative!
That's the idea! But start simple. POV is a bit advanced for beginners.

nodes.userMessage: 'POV: you're a tomato in my garden'! That's genius! I'll film from the ground, in the middle of the plants. My wife's gonna think I've lost it.

choices.text: Go for it! The best videos come from slightly crazy ideas. Your wife will understand when you're famous.
Explain the concept to her! Maybe she'll want to participate. She could play the gardener arriving.

nodes.userMessage: Alright! I'll scroll like you said. Thanks so much for your help! I'll let you know when I'm famous. Bye!
You're right, content first! Thanks for everything. I'm posting my first video tonight. My wife will be my first fan. At least I hope. See you!
Ok I'll look for something upbeat! Thanks for the tips. I'll send you the link to my first video! If I can figure out how to send a link...
Slugs! Good idea! I actually have tons right now. Thanks, you gave me lots of ideas. See you on TikTok! I'll be @GrandpasVeggies. I think.
One per variety! Excellent idea. I have beefsteaks, cherries, heirlooms... That's at least 10 videos! Thanks, you're a genius. Later!
1 second per plant! That's mathematical, I like it. Thanks for everything. I'm gonna be the tomato king of TikTok! Bob's gonna be green. With envy, not like my tomatoes. See ya!
The algorithm! I've heard about that. It's like a robot that decides who sees what right? Ok I'll keep posting then. Thanks for everything! üçÖ
I'll write 'Nice tomatoes Bob, but have you seen mine?' with a wink emoji. That'll get him. Thanks for everything! See you!
A duet! I didn't know that existed. I'll react to his zucchini video. Mine are bigger. Thanks, you're awesome! Later!
It's cut! Phew. She would've made me sleep in the shed otherwise. Thanks for the marital survival advice. See you on TikTok!
I'll ask her... She says no. Absolutely not. Ok I'm cutting it. Thanks anyway! See you!
I'm gonna try them all! My wife's gonna think I've gone crazy. Thanks for everything, this was great. See you, I'll send you my first video!
You're right, I'll save the bunny ears for special videos. Thanks for the advice! See you on TikTok!
Let's go! I'm gonna film my tomatoes. Thanks for everything, you've been super patient. See you, I'm gonna be famous! Maybe. Bye!
A filter video! Genius! I'll go from beard to bunny to robot. My wife's gonna love it. Or not. Thanks! See you!
Done! I'm officially @GrandpasVeggies! Thanks for everything. I'm gonna conquer TikTok one tomato at a time. See you! üçÖ
Oh it's in editing! That makes more sense. It's a bit complicated but I'll learn. Thanks for your patience! See you!
Tutorials on TikTok to learn TikTok! That's clever. I'm on it. Thanks for everything! Later!
POV pruning shears! I'm doing that tomorrow. My wife will film me. If she agrees. Thanks, you're a genius! See you!
I'm gonna be famous! Gary the crazy TikTok gardener. Thanks for everything. I'll send you the video when it's done. Bye! üçÖ
Good idea! She could arrive with the watering can. 'POV: you're a tomato and it's shower time.' Thanks! You're the best. See you!
